title: Mega Plaza: Bar Crawl Adventure
about: Experience the vibrant nightlife of Lima's trendiest location, Mega Plaza, on this exciting bar crawl. Taste authentic Pisco cocktails, meet fellow travelers, and dance the night away in the best local spots.
whatToExpect: Visit 4 unique bars in Mega Plaza
Enjoy a complimentary Pisco Sour or Beer at each location
Learn about Pisco and its importance in Peruvian culture
Experience Lima's nightlife like a local
End the night at a popular dance club
highlights: Visit the famous Calle de las Pizzas
Enjoy stunning views of the Pacific Ocean from a rooftop bar
Skip the line at all venues
additionalInformation: Includes 4 drinks, one at each venue
Food not included, but available for purchase
